attributes.action: Require police offer victim support to all victims of pet theft
attributes.additional_details: Pet theft is on the rise, but owners are often not offered victim support. They are victims of a crime which is on the rise, and the Government need to realise the impact pet theft has on families and that this is a nationwide issue affecting many.
attributes.background: Pet theft is on the rise and owners are victims of crime and should be offered Police Victim Support.
